name: Freddy the Frog
description:
Join Freddy the Frog - A brand new fun filled game of skill for iPhone & iPad

Freddy has been exploring the jungle and has discovered some shiny delights.

However, the jungle is full of nasty obstacles and enemies the want to foil Freddy’s plan of collect every shiny object he can!

So it’s your challenge to help Freddy navigate the jungle one tap at a time.

- Easy to play any time, night or day
- One finger control of Freddy
- Test of skill and reaction
- Leader boards and High Scores
- Endless levels
- Funky music and graphics

Compatible with all iPhones, iPads & iPod Touch
